name: Pirates of the Dead
description:
The ancient myth of the Realm of Secrets is a tale as old as time among pirates.  A world where all lost treasures go. Everyone believes it to be a myth, but you consider otherwise and muster the will to travel through dimensions, and find the truth, and treasures, for yourself.
(Github: https://github.com/Skullheadx/Pygame-Jam)
